        @NotNull
public static String asString(@NotNull
                      ExcerptCommon excerpt)
        Take a text copy of the contents of the Excerpt without changing it's position. Can be called in the debugger.
        Parameters:
        excerpt - to get text from
        Returns:
        256 bytes as text with `.` replacing special bytes.
